code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Modal=_ref=>{let{isOpen,onClose,slides}=_ref;const[currentSlide,setCurrentSlide]=useState(0);if(!isOpen||!slides||slides.length===0)return null;const handlePrevious=()=>{setCurrentSlide(prev=>prev>0?prev-1:slides.length-1);};const handleNext=()=>{setCurrentSlide(prev=>prev<slides.length-1?prev+1:0);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"close-button",onClick:onClose,children:"\xD7"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"slide-title",children:slides[currentSlide].title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"slide-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:slides[currentSlide].img,alt:slides[currentSlide].title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"slide-description",children:slides[currentSlide].description})]}),slides.length>1&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"slide-navigation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-button prev",onClick:handlePrevious,children:"\u25C4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"slide-counter",children:[currentSlide+1," / ",slides.length]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-button next",onClick:handleNext,children:"\u25BA"})]})]})});};export default Modal;
